net.grinder.plugin.http.tcpproxyfilter
Class XSLTHelper

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.plugin.http.tcpproxyfilter.XSLTHelper

public final class XSLTHelper
extends Object

Helper functions for style sheets.

When calling methods that don't have parameters from a style sheet, don't forget the call braces or you'll end up with a no-op.

This class has static methods for consistent behaviour between JDK versions. With instance methods the XSLTC implementation in Java 5.0 needs the instance to be passed as the first argument, whereas the Xalan implementation in Java 1.5 does not.

Author:
Philip Aston

summariseAsLine

public static String summariseAsLine(String value,
                                     int maximumCharacters)
Transform new line characters and other control characters to a printable representation. Truncate string if longer than maximumCharacters. If the string is truncated, add ellipses.

Parameters:
value - The input string.
maximumCharacters - Truncate at this number of characters if result would otherwise be longer.
Returns:
The result.
